style.nav: bg-teal-800 shadow-xl fixed w-full top-0 z-50
style.container: container mx-auto px-8 py-5 flex justify-between items-center
style.mobileMenu: absolute top-0 left-0 w-full bg-teal-800 p-8

style.section: min-h-screen flex items-center justify-center bg-gradient-to-r from-teal-800 to-blue-900 text-white py-24 relative overflow-hidden
style.container: container mx-auto px-6 md:px-12 grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-16 md:gap-20
style.imageContainer: flex justify-center items-center relative mb-12 md:mb-0 md:justify-end
style.image: w-64 h-64 md:w-96 md:h-96 object-cover rounded-full shadow-xl border-4 border-green-400 transform transition-transform duration-500 hover:scale-105
style.textContainer: flex flex-col justify-center items-center text-center md:text-left md:items-start
style.title: text-4xl md:text-5xl font-bold leading-tight text-white
style.subtitle: text-2xl md:text-3xl font-semibold text-green-400
style.description: text-lg md:text-xl text-gray-300 max-w-xl mx-auto md:mx-0 mb-8
style.button: bg-green-400 text-gray-900 px-8 py-3 rounded-full text-lg font-semibold transition-colors duration-300 hover:bg-green-500 transform hover:scale-105
style.scrollIndicator: absolute bottom-4 left-1/2 transform -translate-x-1/2 text-gray-300 text-lg cursor-pointer hover:text-white transition-all

content.title: Hi, I'm Jordan
content.subtitle: I'm a
content.description: Passionate about building user-centric experiences and intuitive designs. I specialize in creating modern, responsive websites and web apps with clean code, engaging UI/UX, and performance optimization. Always learning and pushing the boundaries of web development.
